name: Rin Finance Coin
description: Rin Finance Coin is the native currency of the Rin Finance ecosystem of blockchain events. Through annual awards and recognition events, we aim to play a pivotal role in the blockchain ecosystem by Fostering healthy competition Celebrating achievements Highlighting innovations Built on the Binance Smart Chain, the coin gives holders voting rights to events organized on our platform. There is currently no minimum requirement of tokens user can hold to vote.
